{"step_by_step_thinking": "Phenytoin, Phenobarbitone, Carbamazepine, and Valproate are all anti-epileptic drugs. Phenobarbitone is associated with neonatal withdrawal syndrome and possible cognitive impairment. Carbamazepine is associated with neural tube defects.
